thread.title: Olympics-Biathlon-Men's 12.5km pursuit results

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Olympics-Biathlon-Men's 12.5km pursuit results
text: Feb 12 (Gracenote) - Olympic biathlon men's 12.5km pursuit result in Pyeongchang on Monday. Time MS 1. Martin Fourcade (France) 32 minutes 51.7 seconds (1) 2.
